title: Have the last few versions of the iPhone not really changed? - Quora

response.answer_text: The changes have been much more iterative than groundbreaking; there’s almost nothing in the way of new features, but the old features are getting improved. The body of the phones has been nearly identical since the original iPhone X. On the other hand, the cameras, processors, and other internals are all quicker, sharper, or otherwise better.

The iPhone 11 series make a huge step from IPhone 10 series. Fisrt the iPhone 11 series comes with 4 camera with a new selfie features call slow fie and also a Ultra wide camera that take in your photos. Battery life that last 5hours more than the 10 series and also a faster prossecing speed with the new A13 chip. Their are some many upgraded features on the 11 series.
That’s a lie. There are plenty of substantial changes. The cameras are one change that is visible from the outside. But there are hundreds of internal changes you can’t see from the outside.
